prompt:
Resume work on task-sync-cleanup specification. Work incrementally with commits:

**THIS ITERATION - Complete ONE task only:**
1. Use MCP tool spec-workflow to check status: Call spec-status with projectPath='/home/rmondo/repos/wa-tools/worktrees/task-sync-cleanup' and specName='task-sync-cleanup'
2. Read the tasks.md file to find the NEXT uncompleted task (look for [ ] markers)
3. If you need guidance, use MCP tool spec-workflow-guide to understand the workflow
4. Implement ONLY that one task (delete files, verify tests, etc.)
5. After deletion, verify tests pass: `./vendor/bin/phpunit`
6. Update tasks.md: mark the completed task with [x]
7. Commit changes with descriptive message (include task number and description)
8. DONE - End this iteration (next iteration will continue with next task)

**Critical:**
- Complete ONLY ONE task per iteration (not multiple tasks)
- Use spec-workflow MCP tools for status checking and guidance
- After commit, this iteration is DONE
- Orchestrator will automatically start next iteration
- Each iteration = one task cycle
- This is a cleanup spec - verify before deleting
- ONLY mark final completion checklist when ALL tasks are truly complete

Current completion detection: Check tasks.md for final verification phase completion
